CustomField.description: Displays the total amount of gifts three financial years ago for which the Contact was listed as the Opportunity Primary Contact. Populated automatically via a Customizable Rollup.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the total amount of gifts three financial years ago for which the Contact was listed as the Opportunity Primary Contact. Populated automatically via a Customizable Rollup.
CustomField.label: Total Gifts Three Years Ago
